author: Wzyss
install_msg: Thank you for installing Rockstar Newswire! Use `[p]help rockstarnewswire` to see available commands.
name: RockstarNewswire
short: Track and post Rockstar Games newswire updates.
description: Automatically tracks Rockstar Games newswire feed and posts updates to configured channels. Supports multiple news types including GTA V, GTA VI, RDR2, music, fanart, and more.
